scripts.build:strict: npm run build && npm run --silent check:entry
scripts.check:entry: node -e "const p=require('path');const fs=require('fs');const f=p.resolve('dist/generated/index.js');if(!fs.existsSync(f)){console.error('Missing compiled entry:',f);process.exit(1)}else{console.log('Compiled entry present:',f)}"
